extendedInfo.description: Is basically a battle to beat the same level of the enemy, many people attacked with Red Triangle Batman Batman can jump, boxing, leg sweep, throws, choking and other movements, but also has a lot of disposable his weapon, including batarang , each level in order to beat the end of one of the most powerful people, which requires a little more effort and strategy failed. fifth grade there was a Batman driving the Batmobile and heavily armed enemy cars chasing each other scenes, in order to defeat them, bat vehicles used machine guns.Defeated the "clown", the Batman have to face even more cynical brutality of the "Penguin". "Penguin" Oswald because they were abandoned by their parents at an early age and Heart resentment, extreme psychological hatred of humanity distorted king penguins , bent when the mayor of New York, to facilitate his evil. Celine is a beautiful girl, but put the cat in the clothes, it becomes magical wand paradox Catwoman. Catwoman in Batman encounter after he passionately devoted, do not hesitate and king penguins enemies. Finally, penguin army seized power in New York City officially offensive, Batman Catwoman assistance in defeating the evil king penguins.Classic games, portrait reproduction. Horizontal and vertical screen support, the operation feel good perfect support multi-touch, multi-keys with the press.Hope You EnjoyTags:batman, bat, man, spider, spiderman, spider man, bat man, comic, book, ebook, story, super, superman, robin
